content: मिथस् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Mutually, reciprocally, to each other; <ls>Ms. 2. 147</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab>; मिथःप्रस्थाने <ls>Ś. 2.</ls>; मि थःसमयात् <ls>Ś. 5.</ls> {@--2@} In secret or private, secretly, privately; भर्तुः प्रसादं प्रतिनद्य मूर्ध्ना वक्तुं मिथः प्राक्रमतैवमेनं <ls>Ku. 3. 2</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">6. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Alternately, by turns.
